content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Good afternoon, Miss Mueller. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am very interested in hearing your proposal for the rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 850 Euros per month. I am willing to pay this amount because I believe it is a fair price for the apartment's location and size. I am also willing to sign a long-term lease agreement to ensure stability for both parties.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Miss Mueller. I appreciate your willingness to pay such a high rental price for the apartment. However, I am unable to accept this offer at this time. I am looking for a higher rental price to maximize my gains as a landlord. I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial solution.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand. However, I am unable to pay more than 850 Euros per month. This is my maximum budget. I am also looking for a long-term lease agreement to ensure stability for both parties. Would you be open to discussing a compromise?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your concerns, Miss Mueller. I am willing to discuss a compromise with you. However, I am still looking for a higher rental price than 850 Euros per month. I am willing to consider a long-term lease agreement, but I am also looking for a minimum lease term of 2 years. Please let me know if you are willing to accept these terms.
name: Heinrich Heine
